name: Velocity 99
description:
HIGH PACED SPEED RUNNING GAME Slice, slice and keep slicing the (BIG) "balls" to gain momentum!
Keep learning new ways to play the levels to to improve your scores!
The bots are can not wait any longer! PLAY THE GAME NOW CONTROLS: [Basic Movement]: WASD [Jump (Double Jump)]: SPACE BAR [Slice]: LEFT MOUSE BUTTON [Menu]: ESCAPE
